pages.text: Eggs can be found in several places:$(li)Laid in nests: right click the nest with an empty hand or break the nest.$(li)In rotten wood and mosses: smaller eggs need collecting in a phial, larger eggs can be collected by breaking the block.$(li)Underwater eggs of all kinds: need collecting in a phial.
Eggs produced by mobs will not hatch unless a player interacts with them by collecting them and placing them down again.
